Title: The Flight of the Banshee
Description:
With the island's defenses weakened and the cannons and mages silenced, we're ready to safely bring in our troops once more.

You didn't think you would have to fight all of them by yourself, did you? 

I know you could, but leave some for the rest of us, too.

When you're ready to call the others in, let me know.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Velonara to call in the full force of the Forsaken.
